duties_responsibilities.duty: Prioritize daily tasks based on bid dates and project importance.
Understand company workflows to schedule projects.
Search bid sites and bid larger/complex scop projects when necessary.
Review project numbers and take off meetings.
Request preliminary info from CAD submittals, pile placement plans, and some design/build shoring.
Make job folder for each client and calculate cost of all materials to accurately quote cost of service.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Understanding of industry and company capabilities.
